channel.title: Redhat Openshift (A Container Platform)
channel.description: Overview of OpenShift OpenShift is a comprehensive enterprise-grade container orchestration platform that enables organizations to build, deploy, and manage containerized applications efficiently. It is based on Kubernetes and provides additional features to simplify and enhance the deployment process, making it suitable for production-grade environments. OpenShift is a layer of Red Hat components that sit on top of a Kubernetes cluster Using OpenShift makes it easier to install, configure, network, and manage applications composed of containers.
